title: LF MID LANER, HIGH PLAT/DIAMOND+. FOR 5'S
body:
Hey guys,

INControl is looking for a Mid lane main preferably around the ranks as written above. We are Plat 1 at the moment with a 15-0 w/L rate. We are organized and practice every day. Please add me for further detail, thanks guys.

- Rekt Nerd

replies.body: sent u ingame add on my acc n smurf :)
